revision.text: Possibly: The life, travels, exploits, frauds and robberies, of Charles Speckman, alias Brown, who was executed at Tyburn... Written by himself, whilst under sentence of death in Newgate. (London : Printed for J. Fuller, 1763). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1333843~S1; OR: The travels and adventures of Edward Brown, Esq; formerly a merchant in London..., by John Campbell. (London : Printed by J. Applebee, for A. Bettesworth, and C. Hitch... MDCCXXXIX. [1739]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2439405~S1
